changes.comment: Add `@rushstack/heft-image-typings-generator-plugin` to the `app` and `library` profiles, generating `.d.ts` typings for image files (`.png`, `.jpg`, `.jpeg`, `.gif`, `.svg`, `.ico`, `.webp`, `.avif`). This enables type-safe image imports in TypeScript without needing `allowArbitraryExtensions` or `require()` calls. Also add `.webp` and `.avif` to the webpack asset resource rule.
